title: Elton John in Central Park, New York
brief_description: Recorded live for television, Elton John’s free concert in Central Park, New York attracted over 400,000 people, the largest concert in the US since Woodstock. Enjoy the combination of Elton John’s enthusiasm, his outrageous costumes and some of his best-known songs in this historic and memorable rock concert.
